Package ca.mcgill.splendorserver.model

Class SplendorGame

java.lang.Object
ca.mcgill.splendorserver.model.SplendorGame
@Entity public class SplendorGame extends Object
SplendorGame object which keeps track of all game info including the session info, game id, the turn manage, and the game board.

    • endTurn

      public PlayerWrapper endTurn(PlayerWrapper currentPlayer)
      Checks that it is the passed players turn and then ends their turn, advancing whose turn.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - the player which is calling this, has to be the current player
      Returns:
      the player whose turn it is after the turn has been ended
